segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the sink, and it’s getting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is in her own little world, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing fast, and it’s going to be a huge mess soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids are about to make things even worse with their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will reach them before the mom finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is already slippery, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman might be the last one to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside is so calm, but inside, it’s pure madness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone does something before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, and it’s only getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
